participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents.
I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes.
I treasure the time I spend with my dog, George.
i haven t spoken to my family in years.

participant_2.background:
I'm a night owl and I love the peace and quiet of the morning hours.
I love my dog, but I'm a bit of a loner.
i have few friends.
i retired so i can spend more time with my husband and helping people.
I find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.

content.text: I've been really enjoying the late nights lately, I'm not sure why.
I'm a night owl as well, I love the peace and quiet.
Me too, it's so peaceful. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Charlie.
I love dogs! I have a dog named George, he's my best friend.
That's great, I love spending time with my dog.
Me too, I feel like I can tell him anything.
I know what you mean, dogs are the best listeners.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to help people, I retired so I can spend more time doing that.
That's really nice of you, I'm sure it's very rewarding.
It is, I love making a difference in people's lives.
That's awesome, I'm glad you're able to do that.
Thanks, I am too.
What kind of things do you like to do to help people?
I volunteer at a local soup kitchen and I also donate to charities.
That's great, I'm sure it's much appreciated.
It is, I always feel good when I can help someone in need.
You sound like a very caring person.
Thank you, I try to be.
Me too, I think it's important to help others.
I agree, it's one of the best things we can do.
